  interpolation: {
    escapeValue: false

  react: {
    useSuspense: false
  }
});
export default i18n;

sourcesContent:
import i18n from "i18next";
import { initReactI18next } from "react-i18next";
import LanguageDetector from "i18next-browser-languagedetector";


const resources =  {
    en: {
        translation: {
            "Search":"Search",
            "Title":"Title",
            "Price":"Price",
            "APK FILE":"APK FILE",
            "Edit":"Edit",
            "Delete":"Delete",
            "Previous":"Previous",
            "Next":"Next",
            "Accounts":"Accounts",
            "Settings":"Settings",
            "Logout":"Logout",
            "Add a New Training Course":"Add a New Training Course",
            "Add Formation":"Add Formation",
            "Go to table of formations":"Go to table of formations",
            "Save":"Save",
            "Cancel":"Cancel",
            "Go back":"Go back",
            "Phone":"Phone",
            "Company name":"Company name",
            "Details":"Details",
            "Training Course Name":"Training Course Name",
            "State":"State",
            "finish":"finish",
            "Activate":"Activate",
            "Change password":"Change password",
            "My":"My",
            "Old password":"Old password",
            "New password":"New password",
            "Confirm the new password":"Confirm the new password",
            "Save password":"Save password"
        }
    },
    fr: {
        translation: {
            "Search":"Recherche",
            "Title":"Titre",
            "Price":"Prix",
            "APK FILE":"FICHIER APK",
            "Edit":"Editer",
            "Delete":"Supprimer",
            "Previous":"Précédent",
            "Next":"Suivant",
            "Accounts":"Comptes",
            "Settings":"Paramètres",
            "Logout":"Déconnexion",
            "Add a New Training Course":"Ajouter une nouvelle formation",
            "Add Formation":"Ajouter Formation",
            "Go to table of formations":"Aller au tableau des formations",
            "Save":"Sauvegarder",
            "Cancel":"Annuler",
            "Go back":"Retour",
            "Phone":"Téléphone",
            "Company name":"Non de l'entreprise",
            "Details":"Détails",
            "Training Course Name":"Nom de formation",
            "State":"Etat",
            "finish":"terminer",
            "Activate":"Activer",
            "Change password":"Changer le mot de passe",
            "My":"Mon",
            "Old password":"Ancien mot de passe",
            "New password":"Nouveau mot de passe",
            "Confirm the new password":"Confirmez le nouveau mot de passe",
            "Save password":"Enregistrer le mot de passe",
            "Reset":""
        }
    }
};

i18n
  .use(LanguageDetector)
  .use(initReactI18next) // passes i18n down to react-i18next
  .init({
    resources,
    lng: "en", 
    interpolation: {
      escapeValue: false 
    },
    react:{
        useSuspense:false
    }
});

export default i18n;
